abstract: The app entity describes a journal entry.
overview:
## Overview

Use Swift macros that generate additional properties and add protocol conformance for your app entity implementation. The following example shows an app entity that conforms to the `.journal.entry` schema:

For more information about the `.journal` app intent domain, see [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/Making-journaling-actions-available-to-siri-and-apple-intelligence]. For general information about app intent domains, see [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/Integrating-actions-with-siri-and-apple-intelligence].
title: entry
